about_the_game:
Prison Wars is an old-school browser based PvP MMORPG. A loved and well established classic, with the original version still running and having a dedicated active community!
This is a remake of that same beloved game, by the same people who created the original!

Features

  • We've remade the entire UI from scratch, to include long requested changes and updates.
  • Added 16:9 support and improved textures.
  • Recalibrated balancing.
  • Remade and introduced new game features.

While we've left all the features you know and love Prison Wars for:

  • PvP - Fight all other inmates to see who comes on top!
  • Gangs - Create or join a prison guild with other players.
  • Gang Activities - Co-op with your gang mates and take on jobs together.
  • Gang Wars - Take over prison territories in epic gang wars!
  • Prison Control - Take over enough territories and the guards, and rule them all!
  • Character development - Increase stats the way you want to.
  • Skills - Decide what illicit trades you want to focus on.
  • Global and Local chat functionality - communication is key.

content_descriptors.notes: Prison Wars contains content not appropriate for all ages, or not appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content and Illicit Trade acts.

Prison Wars is an old-school browser based PvP MMORPG. A loved and well established classic, with the original version still running and having a dedicated active community!
This is a remake of that same beloved game, by the same people who created the original!

Features

  • Added 16:9 support and improved textures.
  • Recalibrated balancing.
  • Remade and introduced new game features.

  • Gangs - Create or join a prison guild with other players.
  • Gang Activities - Co-op with your gang mates and take on jobs together.

  • Character development - Increase stats the way you want to.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Prison Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Prison Wars is a well known classic that will let you experience the harsh life inside a maximum security prison. Earn some quick cash, smuggle items and get as much respect as you can from fellow inmates. Make sure you join a gang, take control of the prison and watch your back!
